subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I'm...back--I guess.
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Welcome back Frank. Hope ya enjoyed the vacation. 

Sounds like you kept busy. 

Misty
--- On Mon, 1/12/09, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

> From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] I'm...back--I guess.
> To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Monday, January 12, 2009, 2:32 PM
> Hi All;
>  
>  After a longer than usual absence--I re-joined. This group
> tended to be more ghost hunter oriented, or it seemed that
> way to me. So just to avoid arguements I dropped off for
> awhile. 
>  
>  I've been trying to combine aspects of Spiricom with
> boxes, such as mixing fixed tones in with the radio audio.
> So far, there does seem to be some entities that use the
> tones to enhance voices. The troubel is I have no idea what
> frequencies to use, so I started with a set of eight in the
> leatest test, tuned to the lowest G major scale that would
> register on my auto-chromatic tuner. I have a couple systems
> that use tow tones. 
>  
>  Frank-S
